title: The Naughty owlet
creator_credit: Gyorgy Varwai, Gyula Macskassy and Hungarofilm
brief_description: An animated story of a family of baby owls who live in a hollow tree. One little owl refuses to learn to fly and while his brothers work hard, he spends his time looking at television. One day he is caught outside the nest by a fox and needs desperately to fly to get away. The owl flounders and is almost caught, but with the help of his brothers gets away.
